title: Suricata - Network Protocols
description: - This dashboard provides insights into network protocols such as HTTP, FTP, TLS, TFTP, SSH, RDP, and ARP.

definition.content:
The Suricata Network Protocols dashboard provides an in-depth analysis of various network protocols, including HTTP, FTP, TLS, TFTP, SSH, RDP, and ARP. 

This comprehensive overview helps users monitor network traffic, identify trends, and detect anomalies or security issues. It's a valuable tool for network administrators and security teams to understand protocol usage, troubleshoot issues, and enhance network security posture.

For more information, see the [Suricata Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/suricata).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.
